data.comment: Today's match is followed by 10312 spectators.
The first-half is just kicking off.
Throw-in high up the field for Akhmat Grozny in Rostov-on-Don.
In the minute 2, Throw-in for Rostov at Rostov Arena.
Throw-in for Rostov in their own half.
Rostov are caught offside.
In the minute 4, Throw-in Akhmat Grozny.
Free kick for Rostov in their own half.
Rostov needs to be cautious. Akhmat Grozny have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 6, Can Akhmat Grozny capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Rostov's half?
In Rostov-on-Don Akhmat Grozny attack through Bernard Berisha. The finish is off target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Rostov goal kick.
In the minute 7, Corner awarded to Akhmat Grozny.
Rostov awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Alexey Valerievich Matyunin signals a free kick to Rostov.
In the minute 8, Alexey Valerievich Matyunin signals a Akhmat Grozny throw-in in Rostov's half.
Akhmat Grozny drive forward but Bernard Berisha is judged offside.
In Rostov-on-Don a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 11, Rostov's Dmitri Poloz gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Akhmat Grozny defender.
In Rostov-on-Don, Kento Hashimoto of Rostov is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Rostov have been awarded a corner by Alexey Valerievich Matyunin.
In the minute 12, Rostov have a dangerous throw-in.
Alexey Valerievich Matyunin awards Akhmat Grozny a goal kick.
Akhmat Grozny's Bernard Berisha has run offside.
In the minute 13, Can Rostov get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Akhmat Grozny's half?
Rostov are pushing forward but Denis Hadzikadunic's finish is wide of the goal.
Goal kick for Akhmat Grozny at Rostov Arena.
In the minute 16, Free kick for Rostov in the half of Akhmat Grozny.
Anton Shvets for Akhmat Grozny has been booked by Alexey Valerievich Matyunin and receives a first yellow card.
Roman Eremenko (Rostov) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 17, Corner awarded to Rostov.
Maksim Osipenko (Rostov) gets in a header on goal but the attempt is cleared.
Alexey Valerievich Matyunin signals a free kick to Akhmat Grozny in their own half.
In the minute 20, Akhmat Grozny have been awarded a corner by Alexey Valerievich Matyunin.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Free kick Akhmat Grozny.
In the minute 23, Ball safe as Rostov is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Rostov in the half of Akhmat Grozny.
Goal! Kento Hashimoto heads Rostov into a 1-0 lead.
In the minute 24, Danil Glebov instrumental with a fine assist.
Akhmat Grozny to take a throw-in in Rostov territory.
Alexey Valerievich Matyunin awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 27, Rostov drives forward and Kento Hashimoto gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Akhmat Grozny awarded a free kick in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Rostov-on-Don.
In the minute 28, Akhmat Grozny awarded a free kick in their own half.
Akhmat Grozny to take a throw-in in Rostov territory.
Free kick for Akhmat Grozny in the half of Rostov.

Alexey Valerievich Matyunin signals a free kick to Akhmat Grozny.

Throw-in for Akhmat Grozny close to the penalty box.
Miroslav Bogosavac (Akhmat Grozny) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.

Akhmat Grozny are awarded a penalty at Rostov Arena. Georgi Melkadze takes the kick ... But misses!
Corner awarded to Akhmat Grozny.

Akhmat Grozny have been awarded a corner by Alexey Valerievich Matyunin.
Akhmat Grozny's Marat Bystrov misses with an attempt on goal.

Corner awarded to Akhmat Grozny.
Corner awarded to Akhmat Grozny.

Rostov push forward at Rostov Arena and Roman Eremenko gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Akhmat Grozny defence.
Rostov have been awarded a corner by Alexey Valerievich Matyunin.

A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.

Free kick for Akhmat Grozny in their own half.

Rostov are coming forward and Artur Sokhiev gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Alexey Valerievich Matyunin awards Akhmat Grozny a goal kick.

Akhmat Grozny to take a throw-in in Rostov territory.

Nikolay Poyarkov is replacing Aleksey Kozlov for the home team.
In the minute 75, Throw-in Akhmat Grozny.
Roman Tugarev is replacing Dmitri Poloz for Rostov at Rostov Arena.
Alexey Valerievich Matyunin signals a throw-in for Rostov, close to Akhmat Grozny's area.
Anton Shvets in Akhmat Grozny has been yellow-carded a second time by Alexey Valerievich Matyunin and is being sent off.
In the minute 80, Akhmat Grozny will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Rostov.
Rostov pushes forward through Roman Eremenko, whose finish on goal is saved.
Rostov's Kento Hashimoto gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 81, Ball goes out of play for a Akhmat Grozny goal kick.
The away team have replaced Marat Bystrov with Wilker Angel Romero. This is the third substitution made today by Andrey Talalaev.
Andrey Talalaev is making the team's fourth substitution at Rostov Arena with Islam Alsultanov replacing Evgeny Kharin.
Free kick Akhmat Grozny.
In the minute 82, Kento Hashimoto (Rostov) has received a yellow card from Alexey Valerievich Matyunin.
Rostov's Roman Tugarev breaks free at Rostov Arena. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 83, It's a goal kick for the away team in Rostov-on-Don.
Alexey Valerievich Matyunin signals a free kick to Rostov in their own half.
Corner awarded to Rostov.
In the minute 85, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Pavel Mamaev (Rostov) goes close with a header but the ball is scrambled away by Akhmat Grozny defenders.
Rostov drive into the zone and Pavel Mamaev is presented with a brilliant opportunity. But his strike hits the upright!
In the minute 87, Throw-in for Rostov in the half of Akhmat Grozny.
Akhmat Grozny awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Alexey Valerievich Matyunin awards the away team a throw-in.

Rostov have been awarded a corner by Alexey Valerievich Matyunin.
Kento Hashimoto of Rostov smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 89, Can Akhmat Grozny get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Rostov's half?
Alexey Valerievich Matyunin awards Rostov a goal kick.

Akhmat Grozny to take a throw-in in Rostov territory.
Corner awarded to Akhmat Grozny.
The match has come to a close in Rostov-on-Don. The final score is 3-0.
Rostov take a comfortable 2-0 lead thanks to Roman Eremenko.
That's a fine assist from Artur Sokhiev.
Rostov make their fourth substitution with Aleksandr Gapechkin replacing Pavel Mamaev.
Goal! Danil Glebov extends Rostov's lead to 3-0.
Great play from Aleksandr Gapechkin to set up the goal.
